sentences.en: Alex Fletcher : A walk? What, now?
sentences.cn: 走走? 什么, 现在?

sentences.en: Alex Fletcher : I so get that.
Alex Fletcher : Oh, you look angry. Click your pen.
sentences.cn: 哦, 你生气了. 按掉了你的笔.

sentences.en: Alex Fletcher: Lyrics are important. They're just not as important as melody.
sentences.cn: 歌词很重要. 但是它们也没旋律那么重要吧.

sentences.en: Alex Fletcher: Oh . You look angry. Click your pen.
sentences.cn: 哦, 你看起来生气了,又在咳嗒咳嗒地鼓捣你的笔.

sentences.en: Fletcher : I wouldn't marry Simon. I'd marry me some Paula.
sentences.cn: 我可不会跟西蒙结婚. 要结婚我绝对找宝拉.

sentences.en: Fletcher admits his side must now ensure they stick with Jose Mourinho's men throughout the campaign.
sentences.cn: Fletcher承认他的球队现在一定要紧紧咬住蓝军.

sentences.en: Fletcher Christian : Yes, but of course he attempt it in a ninety - one - foot chamber pot.
sentences.cn: 弗莱切·克里斯坦: 是的, 但是他当然是在九十英尺的夜壶里别无选择.
弗莱彻今天早上去世了.

sentences.en: Fletcher turned to his instructor a moment of fright in his eye.
sentences.cn: 弗莱契转向他的导师,眼里流露出吃惊的神情.

sentences.en: Graham Fletcher was unimpressed with the idea of filling in a lengthy questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆·弗莱彻对填写冗长的调查问卷这种事没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: In between appearances on TV and radio broadcasts, Mr. Fletcher holds an impromptu news conference.
sentences.cn: 在电视和电台播出的空隙之间, 弗莱彻先生举行了一次临时记者招待会.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, Darren Fletcher criminally underrated by many football fans, according to former United star Sammy McIlroy.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 达伦·弗莱彻在很多球迷中评价相当高, 其中包括前曼联球星萨米·麦克罗伊.

sentences.en: Smith now believes Fletcher is beginning to show the same kind of form for United.
sentences.cn: 史密斯相信他正逐步在俱乐部的主力阵容当中站稳脚跟.

sentences.en: You need players like Darren Fletcher in your side.
sentences.cn: 你需要达伦·弗莱彻这样的球员在队里.
